nodes.text: The IrizMark-8 Sentinel-class military cruiser was built by Koensayr Manufacturing during the early years of the New Order.

The IrizMark-8 was primarily used in hit-and-fade operations, where it came in moderately armed and used its speed and maneuverability to retreat. The ship measured 77 meters in length, and required a total of six crew to operate.
Clabburn the Younger used a modified IrizMark-8, named Broken Jaw, in his pirating escapades.
